attributes.action: Make the punishment fit the crime
attributes.additional_details:
The law abiding citizens of this country are fed up with offenders getting 'a slap on the wrists' for crime in the name of saving money or human rights.
If someone commits a crime, they are removing another persons human rights, and therefore should forfeit their own.

Scrap suspended sentences, as these are a waste of time, and have a jury of peers decide on a sentence within structured guidelines
